system.description: Effect: The user temporarily recalls a target within Range into an energized Max Ball. Then, the user may throw the target's Ball a distance up to 150% of the user's Fling Range and send the target out, centered on that spot, wherein the target uses Become Giant! as a Free Aciton.

actions.name: Max Lob!
actions.description: Effect: The user temporarily recalls a target within Range into an energized Max Ball. Then, the user may throw the target's Ball a distance up to 150% of the user's Fling Range and send the target out, centered on that spot, wherein the target uses Become Giant! as a Free Aciton.
